import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../home/Home.css'; import Sidebar from '../sidebar/sidebar'; import Header from '../sidebar/header'; class ListEmployees extends React.Component { constructor(props:any) { super(props); this.state = { data: [] }; } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://www.o-nolimit.com/Admin/Api/Employee/GetEmployees') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ data })) .catch(e => { console.log(e); return e; }); // this.handleSubmit; } dataListCustomer() { return( this.state.data.map(function(item: any, i: any){ return( {item.EmployeeCode} {item.EmployeeName} {item.Address} {item.Email} {item.HomePhone} {item.OfficePhone} {item.MobilePhone} {item.Fax} {item.Birthday} {item.Sex} // ) }) ) } render(){ this.componentDidMount(); return (
